articles.author: James Marson
articles.title: Inside Europe’s Cocaine Gateway: ‘A Repeat of Miami in the 1980s’ - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Antwerp, now the No. 1 port in Europe for cocaine busts, has seen a rise in gang violence and corruption
articles.content:
ANTWERP, BelgiumFor centuries, goods flowing through the giant port here have enriched this elegant city, known for its diamonds, art and fashion.
Now a different import from across the Atlanticcoca… [+122 chars]
